Articles.Content:
I'm looking for a minimalistic autopilot mod, preferably with pro grade, retrograde and maneuver node options only. Mechjeb is way to much for me. I know i can blacklist modules but i don't like the modules i have to attach to my probes in order to get their S.M.A.R.T.A.S.S functionality.

is there anything like that out there? I've searched a lot but I'm unable to find much.

Thanks
RT2's flight computer is a bit like that.
Or you can use ModuleManger to add Mechjeb to all your command pods...
